title: What's WERK?
content: WERK is a platform that allows individuals to provide services as well as to hire services for their own needs.

title: Is it free?
content:
Signing up is free! Upon launching the WERK app, click the Login button on the bottom right-hand corner. Fill in your Email, Password, Profile name and click sign up. You will be prompted to validate your email address next.

Congratulations, you have just signed up for a WERK account! The system automatically sends a validation email to your email address.

title: Can I have more than one WERK account?
content:
In line with WERK’s commitment to creating a safe platform, you may only have one account on WERK unless expressly permitted.

We understand that every service provider and employer is unique and may have different needs. If you require more than 1 account on WERK, let us know and we’ll assess your request.

title: How do I contact you?
content: If you need further assistance, contact us! We are here to help, just drop us an email at admin@werk.sg.
